name: Kinky Scorched Earth Operation
description:
This is a prototype for a military fetish-themed dress-up game.

The title "Kinky Scorched Earth Operation" was randomly generated (https://www.videogamena.me/) and I developed the concept from there.

The original prototype included music I had to remove for copyright reasons, but you can listen to it for free on Bandcamp (though I kindly ask you to support the artist):

https://phasenmensch.bandcamp.com/album/begegnungen
(Track 6: Verteidigungsmaßnahme)
